name: 1. Open Notification Setting and verify paging last, first, next, previous

testSteps.description: [1] {notificationMenu=Notification Setting, parentMenuText=Notification, nextPage=next, lastPage=last, previousPage=previous, firstPage=first, numberPaging=20, addBtn=Add, number=4009912, string=123456, lang=en}

children.description: When I open Login page
And I input my credentials username 4009912 and password 123456
And I change language to en
And I open submenu Notification Setting of parent menu Notification
Then The system should open 'Notification' page

And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below
| valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName |
| random | All position | All employee |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add

And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below
| valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName |
| second in list dropdown | All position | All employee |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add

And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below
| valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName |
| 東京 | All position | All employee |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
And In Notification Setting screen, I click button next page on paging
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table should show next page
When In Notification Setting screen, I click button last page on paging
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table should show last page
When In Notification Setting screen, I click button previous page on paging
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table should show previous page
And In Notification Setting screen, Table show result with 20 results in page
When In Notification Setting screen, I click button first page on paging
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table should show first page
And In Notification Setting screen, Table show result with 20 results in page
And I logout from system

userStory.narrative:
As an user
I want to be able use Notification Setting

title: 1. Open Notification Setting and verify paging last, first, next, previous
